collectors.title: Database
collectors.titleDetails: (100 total Queries, 100 of them unique across 1 Connection)

queries.sql: SELECT `settings`.*, `currencies`.`currency`, `currencies`.`symbol` FROM `settings` LEFT JOIN `currencies` ON `currencies`.`id` = `settings`.`currency_id` WHERE `settings`.`deleted_at` IS NULL AND `settings`.`id` = 1

SELECT `users`.*, `branches`.`branch_name`, `positions`.`position`, `positions`.`id` as `position_id`, `departments`.`department_name` FROM `users` LEFT JOIN `branches` ON `branches`.`id` = `users`.`branch_id` LEFT JOIN `staffs` ON `staffs`.`id` = `users`.`staff_id` LEFT JOIN `positions` ON `positions`.`id` = `staffs`.`position_id` LEFT JOIN `departments` ON `departments`.`id` = `positions`.`department_id` WHERE `users`.`deleted_at` IS NULL AND `users`.`id` = '1'
SELECT DISTINCT `id`, `id` FROM `clients` WHERE `access_status` = 'Active' AND `clients`.`deleted_at` IS NULL
SELECT DISTINCT `client_id`, `client_id` FROM `entries` WHERE `account_typeId` = 12 AND `entries`.`deleted_at` IS NULL

SELECT `particulars`.`id`, `particulars`.`particular_code`, `particulars`.`particular_name`, `particulars`.`category_id`, `categories`.`part` FROM `particulars` LEFT JOIN `categories` ON `categories`.`id` = `particulars`.`category_id` WHERE `account_typeId` = 12 AND `particulars`.`deleted_at` IS NULL
SELECT * FROM `clients` WHERE `clients`.`deleted_at` IS NULL AND `clients`.`id` = '1'
